title: Red Bull Global Rallycross 2015
text:
Red Bull Global Rallycross 2015 Where 
3:30 p.m. Wednesday, Nov. 4, 2015 Categories 
Events, Sports Red Bull Global Rallycross returns to Las Vegas November 4th for their 2015 season finale. See the cars and stars starting at 3:30PM at The Village Lot across from the Luxor. Every ticket is a pass to the paddock! Don't miss your chance to meet the drivers 8PM Monday night at the SLS hotel, the official hotel of Red Bull Global Rallycross Las Vegas, at the open autograph session. Ticket Prices: Adult GA $25 Adult Preferred $65 Kids 12 and under free Get your tickets now at RedBullGlobalRallycross.com/Tickets Related
